00075   int id;
00076   printf("Whittle Tree: a tool for reducing a spanning tree to a smaller representation\n"
00077       "  This tool takes an input file that holds a spanning tree and then whittles\n"
00078          "  the structure to a smaller form in order to provide a more convenient way\n"
00079          "  to examine and compare one or more meshes.\n"
00080       "\n"
00081       "Usage: whittle_tree [options] <algorithm>\n"
00082       "  [-i input file  ]                input file (default=result_tree.e)\n"
00083       "  [-o output file ]                output file (default=result_tree_whittled.e)\n" 
00084       "  [-m mesh_name[step]]             can be appended with displacement step, like block_1[2])\n"
00085       "  [-d displacement_variable_name ] (does combinding on _x,_y,_z and defaults to 'displacement')\n"
00086       "  [-p 0-99 ]                       desired percentage of nodes to survive\n"           
00087       "   -v                              display warning messages\n"
00088       "   -V                              display log messages\n"
00089       "   -S                              Silent operation: don't print info\n"
00090          "   -h                              this help screen\n"
00091       "   -w algorithm                    select whittle algorithm\n");
00092 
00093   for(i=0; (rc=getNextWhittleAlgorithmDescription(i,&name, &sname, &id, &description)); i++){
00094     printf("        %s : %23s - %s\n", sname, name, description);
00095   }
00096 
00097   exit(0);
00098 }
